mwFileUpload.dropFiles: Drop your file here to upload it
mwFileUpload.invalidMimeType: The uploaded file is invalid. Mime-Type has to be {{mimeType}}

invalidFilterModal.title: The filter is invalid
invalidFilterModal.description: The filter "{{name}}" contains filter attributes that are either not available anymore or have been changed. Therefore the filter does not work anymore. You can either modify the filter to make it work again or delete it.
